name: Sales Order Report
query:
select 
    `tabSales Order`.customer_name AS 'Customer Name:Link/Item:120', 
    `tabSales Order`.name as "Name::120",
    `tabSales Order Item`.item_code as "Item Code::120",
    `tabSales Order Item`.item_name as "Item Name::120",
    `tabSales Order Item`.billing_cycle as "Billing Cycle::120",
    `tabSales Order Item`.service_start_date as "Service Start Date::120",
    `tabSales Order Item`.service_end as "Service End Date::120",
    `tabSales Order Item`.next_inv_dt as "Next INV DATE::120",
    `tabSales Order Item`.status as "Status::120" 
from 
`tabSales Order`
    INNER JOIN `tabSales Order Item` 
    ON `tabSales Order`.name=`tabSales Order Item`.parent;
